name: Mogu Man
description:
Help Mogu Man eat all the Xs without getting trapped by the Δs in this nostalgic minimalist action puzzler.

Instructions:

• Enter or mouse click to progress screen
• Arrow keys or mouse click to move

Details:

This Lite version includes 16 stages, with more than 100 in the full version.

FEATURES:
• Manual & Automatic Save System
• 4 maps (many more in the full version)
• 4 charming chiptunes by RoleMusic
• Arcade action puzzles to challenge your wits and reflexes
• No time limit
• No game over
